languages.text: "Их конечная цель всегда — мятеж. Они могут готовиться к нему много поколений, копя оружие и силы, но однажды они атакуют. Этот день — "день откровения", пик их богохульной веры. В этот день они ждут, что с неба сойдут кощунственные "Дети звезд", которые вознесут своих почитателей".

"Their end goal is always mutiny. They can prepare for many generations, accumulating weapons and numbers, until one day, they attack. That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."
languages.original_text: "Их конечная цель всегда — мятеж. Они могут готовиться к нему много поколений, копя оружие и силы, но однажды они атакуют. Этот день — "день откровения", пик их богохульной веры. В этот день они ждут, что с неба сойдут кощунственные "Дети звезд", которые вознесут своих почитателей".

That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."

They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."

languages.text: “他们的最终目标是发动叛乱。他们可能会花上很多代人的时间慢慢准备，不断积累武器与信徒。等到时机成熟的时候，他们便会发动攻击。叛乱的那一天被他们称为‘启示之日’，象征着他们邪恶信仰的巅峰。他们认为在那一天，他们邪恶的‘星辰之子’会从天而降，让所有追随者获得擢升。”
languages.original_text: "Their end goal is always mutiny. They can prepare for many generations, accumulating weapons and numbers, until one day, they attack. That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."

traits.locale_text: “他们的最终目标是发动叛乱。他们可能会花上很多代人的时间慢慢准备，不断积累武器与信徒。等到时机成熟的时候，他们便会发动攻击。叛乱的那一天被他们称为‘启示之日’，象征着他们邪恶信仰的巅峰。他们认为在那一天，他们邪恶的‘星辰之子’会从天而降，让所有追随者获得擢升。”

languages.text: «Su meta final es siempre el motín. Pueden organizarse durante generaciones, haciendo acopio de armas y adeptos, hasta que llegue el momento de atacar. Ese día es su "día de la revelación", la apoteosis de su blasfema religión. Creen que entonces los "Hijos de las Estrellas" emergerán del vacío para ensalzar a sus adoradores».
languages.original_text: "Their end goal is always mutiny. They can prepare for many generations, accumulating weapons and numbers, until one day, they attack. That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."

traits.locale_text: «Su meta final es siempre el motín. Pueden organizarse durante generaciones, haciendo acopio de armas y adeptos, hasta que llegue el momento de atacar. Ese día es su "día de la revelación", la apoteosis de su blasfema religión. Creen que entonces los "Hijos de las Estrellas" emergerán del vacío para ensalzar a sus adoradores».

languages.text: 「彼らの最終的な目標は常に反乱です。彼らは何世代にもわたって準備し、武器と数を蓄えることが可能でした。とある攻撃の日まで備えているのです。その日こそが彼らの『啓示の日』であり、冒涜的な信仰の神格化です。その日、彼らの冒涜的な『星の御子ら』が虚空から降臨し、崇拝者たちを昇天させると彼らは考えています」
languages.original_text: "Their end goal is always mutiny. They can prepare for many generations, accumulating weapons and numbers, until one day, they attack. That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの最終的な目標は常に反乱です。彼らは何世代にもわたって準備し、武器と数を蓄えることが可能でした。とある攻撃の日まで備えているのです。その日こそが彼らの『啓示の日』であり、冒涜的な信仰の神格化です。その日、彼らの冒涜的な『星の御子ら』が虚空から降臨し、崇拝者たちを昇天させると彼らは考えています」

languages.text: "Ihr Endziel ist stets Meuterei. Sie können sich viele Generationen lang vorbereiten, Waffen und Leute sammeln, bis sie eines Tages zuschlagen. Das ist ihr 'Tag der Offenbarung', die Apotheose ihres gottlosen Glaubens. Sie denken, dass an diesem Tag ihre blasphemischen 'Sternenkinder' aus der Leere herabsteigen und ihre Gläubigen erhöhen."
languages.original_text: "Their end goal is always mutiny. They can prepare for many generations, accumulating weapons and numbers, until one day, they attack. That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Endziel ist stets Meuterei. Sie können sich viele Generationen lang vorbereiten, Waffen und Leute sammeln, bis sie eines Tages zuschlagen. Das ist ihr 'Tag der Offenbarung', die Apotheose ihres gottlosen Glaubens. Sie denken, dass an diesem Tag ihre blasphemischen 'Sternenkinder' aus der Leere herabsteigen und ihre Gläubigen erhöhen."

languages.text: « Leur objectif ultime est toujours la mutinerie. Ils sont capables de s'y préparer plusieurs générations durant, accumulant les armes et les effectifs, jusqu'au jour où ils passent à l'action. Le "jour de la révélation", c'est ainsi qu'ils appellent l'apothéose de leur foi impie, persuadés qu'en cet instant fatidique, leurs infâmes "Enfants Stellaires" descendront du vide pour oindre leurs fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "Their end goal is always mutiny. They can prepare for many generations, accumulating weapons and numbers, until one day, they attack. That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."

traits.locale_text: « Leur objectif ultime est toujours la mutinerie. Ils sont capables de s'y préparer plusieurs générations durant, accumulant les armes et les effectifs, jusqu'au jour où ils passent à l'action. Le "jour de la révélation", c'est ainsi qu'ils appellent l'apothéose de leur foi impie, persuadés qu'en cet instant fatidique, leurs infâmes "Enfants Stellaires" descendront du vide pour oindre leurs fidèles. »

languages.text: "Nihai amaçları her daim isyandır. Nesiller boyunca hazırlanabilir, hem silahlarını hem de saflarını artırabilirler. Ta ki saldırıya geçecekleri gün gelene dek... O gün onların 'aydınlanma günü', yani kâfir inançlarının en üstün mertebesidir. Tam o günde günahkâr 'Yıldız Çocukları'nın uçsuzdan aramıza inerek müritlerini göklere yükseltecelerine inanırlar."
languages.original_text: "Their end goal is always mutiny. They can prepare for many generations, accumulating weapons and numbers, until one day, they attack. That day is their 'day of revelation,' the apotheosis of their profane faith. They think that on that day, their blasphemous 'Star Children' will descend from the void and elevate their worshippers."
